CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', ((Conclusion_Date__c - Published_Date__c)/365)* (Billing_Account_Revenue__c * Published_Rate__c), ((Conclusion_Date__c - Published_Date__c)/365)* (Customer_Revenue__c * Published_Rate__c) )
CustomField.label: In year forecast APR uplift
